author: João Laranjeira
comment: Ambience mode offers several options. However sometimes too pixelized. Drains the battery much  faster then Standart watch faces (10h).
title: On Moto 360 2nd generation

author: Kyle Cass
comment: I used to have this watch face for LG g r and loved it but now I have the Gear s2 and I can't seem to find any settings or any way to bring the digital time to 12hr format. Any help would be freely appreciated. Will change to 5 stars once fixed.
title: Gear S2 always on military time

author: Donny Rogers
comment: Looks super on my watch. My new favorite! I have the app swapp that dims the screen down in ambient mode and allows so many of these watch faces that looked washed out on my G WATCH R to now look amazing!
title: Great watch face

author: Cody Tracy
comment: Power display is wrong on lg watch urbane
